price: Àti pé ní alẹ́ àti nígbà tí àwọn ìràwọ̀ bá kúrò níta tán¹, ṣàfọ̀mọ́ fún Un.
footnotes: 1. “nígbà tí àwọn ìràwọ̀ bá kúrò níta tán” àsìkò yẹn ni àsìkò tí fajr òdodo máa là.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
